participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Pragmatic and family-oriented, Michael values stability and enjoys sharing his experiences.
participant_1.background: i just bought a house recently. i'm married with two kids. i see the rolling stones in concert every year. i'm an economics major. i eat a raw diet.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Curious and imaginative, Lily loves to explore her thoughts and express herself creatively.
participant_2.background: when i grow up i want to be a dog. i like to eat chocolate candy. i like to look at blocks and sing about letters. i am four years old. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding.
